text: Stefano Pessina (born June 4, 1941) is an Italian-Monegasque billionaire businessman. He is the vice chairman, chief executive officer (CEO), and the largest single shareholder of Walgreens Boots Alliance. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Italian businesspeople Category:Italian philanthropists Category:Monegasque people Category:People from Pescara
title: Stefano Pessina
